answers.answer: I'm just so impatient I wish I was further along since I'm having complications with diabetes.
This is my third pregnancy I am very uncomfortable already I feel like I'm 4 or 5 months n my belly sticks out :( but I'm on 2 1/2
Glad im not the only one. Very impatient person as well. Ready for April.
Yeah me too. This is my first and im so sick that I told mt husband we may be having an omly child cause I want a baby but this is not an experience I like so far! Lol I'm uncomfortable and sick.

question: Is anyone else already have issues with being pregnant? Finding that clothes are already feeling tight and cant even imagine what it will be like in another few months? I know this is a happy time and most people enjoy every moment, but im sure there are the small few that dont feel overjoyed about feeling sick so much of the time and about gaining weight.
title: Impatient already...
